Replace.Text: Barricades increase a city's Defense Strength, making the city more difficult to capture.

+10 XP for land Units.[NEWLINE]+15 [ICON_PERSONNEL] Personnel / turn.[NEWLINE]Can house 100 [ICON_PERSONNEL] Personnel. Allows construction of Military Academy and Military Base, needed to create projects.
+20 XP for all Units.[NEWLINE]+25 [ICON_PERSONNEL] Personnel / turn.[NEWLINE]City must have Barracks. Allows the creation of new weapon designs.

Can stock 100 [ICON_MATERIEL] Materiel.[NEWLINE]Can house 500 [ICON_PERSONNEL] Personnel.[NEWLINE]+15 XP for all Units.[NEWLINE]City must have Barracks. May allow the preparation of military operations.
Allows construction of factory extensions for air, sea or land units.[NEWLINE]+20 [ICON_MATERIEL] Materiel / turn.[NEWLINE]Can stock 50 [ICON_MATERIEL] Materiel.

Forms a [ICON_CONNECTED] Trade Route with the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital over water (if they're not already [ICON_CONNECTED] connected by land).[NEWLINE]City must be built on the coast.[NEWLINE]+15% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production for Naval Units.[NEWLINE]+10 [ICON_MATERIEL] Materiel / turn.[NEWLINE]Can stock 50 [ICON_MATERIEL] Materiel.
The Hospital will heal wounded soldiers.[NEWLINE]+20 [ICON_PERSONNEL] Personnel / turn.

Using radio to broadcast propaganda will gain new recruits for the army.[NEWLINE]Combined with an Administrative Building, it will allow units recruiting in occupied cities.[NEWLINE]+10 [ICON_PERSONNEL] Personnel / turn.
Allows administration of occupied cities.[NEWLINE]Combined with a Broadcast Tower to diffuse our propaganda, it will allow units recruiting in occupied cities.
Banks will raise your gold production

Row.Text: Allows construction of medium and heavy tanks.[NEWLINE]+15% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production when building Land Units.[NEWLINE]+15 [ICON_MATERIEL] Materiel / turn.[NEWLINE]Can stock 50 [ICON_MATERIEL] Materiel.

Allows construction of fighters, fighters-bombers and attack aircrafts.[NEWLINE]+10% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production when building Air Units.[NEWLINE]+5 [ICON_MATERIEL] Materiel / turn.[NEWLINE]Can stock 20 [ICON_MATERIEL] Materiel.

Allows construction of heavy fighters and light/fast bombers.[NEWLINE]+10% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production when building Air Units.[NEWLINE]+5 [ICON_MATERIEL] Materiel / turn.[NEWLINE]Can stock 20 [ICON_MATERIEL] Materiel.

Allows construction of bombers and heavy bombers.[NEWLINE]+10% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production when building Air Units.[NEWLINE]+5 [ICON_MATERIEL] Materiel / turn.[NEWLINE]Can stock 20 [ICON_MATERIEL] Materiel.

Allows construction of submarines, battleships and dreadnougth.[NEWLINE]+10% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production when building Sea Units.[NEWLINE]+15 [ICON_MATERIEL] Materiel / turn.[NEWLINE]Can stock 50 [ICON_MATERIEL] Materiel.
You can't set defensive position in this city.
